titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that any limitation under Federal tax law on the deductibility of compensation exceeding $1 million paid to executives individually should be expanded to apply to compensation paid to entertainers and athletes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/1/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Congress that any limitation under Federal tax law on the deductibility of compensation exceeding $1 million paid to executives individually should be expanded to apply to compensation paid to entertainers and athletes.
